name: Little Unfinished Turn By Turn Strategy Game
name_original: Little Unfinished Turn By Turn Strategy Game
description:
Turn-based strategy game : 

Controls : Mouse/clicking

I made this game in about a month using unity. I've mostly focus on implementing new mechanics rather than having astonishing graphics. This game was simply a way to challenge me into making something bigger than what I usually go for. 

Please if you have time, leave a comment and give me your absolute honest opinion. Even if it is harsh I would always value honesty over my own well-being and self-esteem. If it is not too much to ask you consider also tipping me 2.00$ as it would really encourage me to keep my effort and it would be my first step as a professional game developper.

Enjoy, Altoo.
